SEARCH
Package services

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
services.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
A singleton service class that manages financial transactions and implements the Observer pattern for transaction updates. This class serves as the central manager for all transaction-related operations and coordinates updates between the data service and registered listeners.

The TransactionManager follows the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance manages all transaction data across the application. It maintains a list of listeners that are notified of any changes to the transaction data.

Example usage: 

 TransactionManager manager = TransactionManager.getInstance();
 manager.addListener(new TransactionListener() {
     public void onTransactionAdded(String date, String desc, String amount, String type) {
         // Handle new transaction
     }
     // ... implement other listener methods
 });
 manager.addTransaction("01/01/2024", "Grocery", "$100.50", "Expense");
Version:
1.0
Author:
System

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TransactionManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of TransactionManager. Creates a new instance if one doesn't exist.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of TransactionManager

    • addListener

      public void addListener(TransactionManager.TransactionListener listener)
      Registers a new transaction listener. The listener will be notified of all transaction changes.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be registered

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
      Adds a new transaction and notifies all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      date - the transaction date
      description - the transaction description
      amount - the transaction amount
      type - the transaction type (Income/Expense)

    • updateTransaction

      public void updateTransaction(int index, String date, String description, String amount, String type)
      Updates an existing transaction and notifies all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transaction to update
      date - the new transaction date
      description - the new transaction description
      amount - the new transaction amount
      type - the new transaction type

    • removeTransaction

      public void removeTransaction(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
      Removes a transaction and notifies all registered listeners.
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the transaction to remove
      description - the description of the transaction to remove
      amount - the amount of the transaction to remove
      type - the type of the transaction to remove

    • getAllTransactions

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getAllTransactions()
      Retrieves all transactions.
      Returns:
      a list of all transaction records

    • getWeeklySpending

      public Map<String,Double> getWeeklySpending()
      Gets the weekly spending analysis.
      Returns:
      a map containing daily spending totals for the current week

    • getExpenseCategories

      public Map<String,Double> getExpenseCategories()
      Gets the expense category analysis.
      Returns:
      a map containing expense categories and their total amounts
